source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Add WOW to Your Paintings!

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Painter, International Author & Art Instructor
visible_instructors.name: Nancy
visible_instructors.title: Nancy Reyner

items.headline: Learn to Paint with Confidence & Greatly Improve Your Paintings. Any Medium or Style will Benefit.
objectives_summary: Painting techniques rarely taught in art schools to add exciting visual movement to your images.
Move your painting to the next level.
Learn how to bring more attention to your paintings.

items.title: Art Journaling - A Playful Introduction
items.headline: Use a four step approach to create three very different Art Journal pages and get inspired to create more!
objectives_summary: Create your own Art Journaling pages
Identify an adequate color scheme for your picture
Express an idea or a feeling through your art

items.title: Draw & Paint With Color: 9 Fun Art Projects for Beginners
items.headline: How to Use Tempera, Acrylic, & Poster Paints to Create 9 Fun Painting Projects. Designed Especially for Beginners.
objectives_summary: Create 9 colorful and creative paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Watercolor Painting. 5 ESSENTIAL tips to paint with impact.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: I consider these the most valuable  lessons you will learn when painting with watercolours.  See your work transformed.
objectives_summary: Students will understand the process of planning the most attractive composition for any given subject
Understand the importance of color values and how to use them in watercolors
Understand and take advantage of the ability to make changes following mistakes

items.title: Canvas Workspace - Creating Boxes & Envelopes
items.headline: Design & Customize Projects for your Brother ScanNCut
objectives_summary: You will be able to customize Canvas Workspace Projects.
You will be able to design boxes & envelopes using Canvas Workspace.
You will learn how to use Canvas Workspace tools and work with layers.

items.title: Learn Business of Acting: Book Work in TV & FILM
items.headline: Show Business is 50% Art & 50% Business, this course will educate you on the business to control your career.
objectives_summary: Learn the Business of Acting (The Biz in showbiz)
Learn how to properly Brand yourself with Industry Professionals
Steps to create the proper marketing materials to get auditions

items.title: Modern Art Movements: Explore all -ISMs of the 20th century
items.headline: Learn Modern Art styles and movements, including most renowned paintings and artists from Impressionism to Pop Art
objectives_summary: Various styles and movements of Modern Art
Renowned artists, designers, and architects of Modern Art
Famous paintings and projects of the late 19th - 20th centuries

items.title: How to make a professional drawing using lines

visible_instructors.name: Anna
visible_instructors.title: Anna Yurchenko
visible_instructors.job_title: Customer service, process and service management expert

items.headline: During the course we will draw a sketch using different types of lines
objectives_summary: Draw using different types and thickness of the line
Working with pencil and marker
Techniques for training observation and ability to focus on something

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 3: Garment Basics (Drawing)
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to draw the basic folds that are used to create garments in Byzantine iconography and how line is used to create volume.

items.title: Watercolor Techniques with Geoff Hutchins

visible_instructors.job_title: English Professional Artist and Tutor Geoff Hutchins
visible_instructors.name: Geoff
visible_instructors.title: Geoff Hutchins

items.headline: Landscapes and Seascapes
objectives_summary: You will learn how to paint Landscapes and Seascapes using simple and effective Watercolor Techniques
Learn the bascis of composition, texture and perspective
You will be more informed about brush, paint and paper types, and what works for you

items.title: Acrylic Landscape Paintings for Beginners to Advance

visible_instructors.job_title: Experts in Mathematics, Science, Accounting & Art and Craft
visible_instructors.name: LetsTute
visible_instructors.title: LetsTute Make it Easy

items.headline: A Complete Course to learn the Basics of Acrylic Paintings on Canvas with some secret tips & techniques using Acrylic
objectives_summary: Complete beginner level landscape paintings
Understand more about Color & Mixing Color
Various ways to use acrylics for painting

items.title: Photoshop Tutorials: Turn Family Photos Into Art

visible_instructors.job_title: Photoshop expert teaching Photoshop to artists: 4 courses
visible_instructors.name: Cat
visible_instructors.title: Cat Whipple

items.headline: Easy Photoshop tutorials: Learn how to use Photoshop by turning family photos into Photoshop art your family will love.
objectives_summary: GAIN the skills to create one-of-a-kind family portraits that your family will treasure forever.
BECOME an intermediate Photoshop user in as little as two days.
ATTAIN the Photoshop skills to create other unique altered photography art.

items.title: Upholstery Fundamentals
items.headline: Master the basic skills of upholstery of diningroom chairs, tubular chairs, tools, machines and a vintage cocktail chair
objectives_summary: Master basic upholstery skills with high quality finishings
Re-upholster various types of dining room chairs
Use Upholstery tools

items.title: Sumie - Bamboo for beginners -
items.headline: Zōhō techinique
objectives_summary: You will be able to draw a bamboo by Zōhō technique.

visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk

items.headline: A streamlined structure to learning how to draw animals
objectives_summary: Learn to draw animals
Understand basic animal anatomy

items.title: colored pencils on sanded paper, the basics
items.headline: working with colored pencils and the Brush and Pencil supplies on sanded paper
objectives_summary: you will learn the first basic techniques of coloring on sanded paper , using the Brush and Pencil supplies and other tools
you will learn to solve little mistakes or bigger ones in your drawings
you will know easy ways to create a useful linedrawing
